docs.title: vizelec
docs.text:
Usage:

$ vizelec [OPTIONS] COMMAND [ARGS]...

Options:

  • --install-completion: Install completion for the current shell.
  • --show-completion: Show completion for the current shell, to copy it or customize the installation.
  • --help: Show this message and exit.

Commands:

  • pinout
  • spice

docs.title: vizelec pinout
docs.text:
Usage:

$ vizelec pinout [OPTIONS] COMMAND [ARGS]...

Options:

  • --help: Show this message and exit.

Commands:

  • show

docs.title: vizelec pinout show
docs.text:
Usage:

$ vizelec pinout show [OPTIONS] CONF_FILE

Arguments:

  • CONF_FILE: [required]

Options:

  • --help: Show this message and exit.

docs.title: vizelec spice
docs.text:
Usage:

$ vizelec spice [OPTIONS] COMMAND [ARGS]...

Options:

  • --help: Show this message and exit.

Commands:

  • load: Create a graph representation of the...

docs.title: vizelec spice load
docs.text:
Create a graph representation of the schematic given by schem. :param schem: path to a spice file. :param show: display the netlist as a graph

Usage:

$ vizelec spice load [OPTIONS] SCHEM

Arguments:

  • SCHEM: [required]

Options:

  • --show / --no-show: [default: show]
  • --help: Show this message and exit.

docs.title: Canvas
docs.text: This page provides documentation for our command line tools.

docs.title: canvas
docs.text:
Usage:

 [OPTIONS] COMMAND [ARGS]...

Options:

  --install-completion  Install completion for the current shell.
  --show-completion     Show completion for the current shell, to copy it or
                        customize the installation.

docs.title: draw-canvas
docs.text:
Usage:

 draw-canvas [OPTIONS] N_WELL_N N_WELL_P FINGER H_WELL_N H_WELL_P

Options:

  N_WELL_N  [required]
  N_WELL_P  [required]
  FINGER    [required]
  H_WELL_N  [required]
  H_WELL_P  [required]

docs.title: load
docs.text:
Create a graph representation of the schematic given by schem. :param schem: path to a spice file. :param show: display the netlist as a graph

Usage:

 spice load [OPTIONS] SCHEM

Options:

  SCHEM               [required]
  --show / --no-show  [default: show]
